text: irisumi ya dasi yemideregilachewinina dasi yemayideregilachewini atikilitochi yefet’ere newi፡፡ zemibabanimi (yetemirini zafi) azimeranimi firewochu yeteleyayu sihonu weyiranina rumaninimi (k’it’elachewi) temesasayina (t’a‘imachewi) yemayimesaseli sihonu (fet’ere)፡፡ bafera gize kefirewi bilu፡፡ be’ach’edawimi k’eni tegebiwini (zeka) sit’u፡፡ atabakinumi፡፡ irisu abakanyochini ayiwedimina፡፡
